DOC.brief_summary: Measure if FDA regulation of Colchicne in 2009 has resulted in safer use in clinical settings. Our study will assess the impact of this Initiative on colchicine use and will provide data that supports its continuation and expansion.
DOC.brief_title: Impact of Unapproved Drug Initiative on Colchicine Use
